content: Created `pyproject.toml` defining the `dgpipe` package metadata, core/dev dependencies, CLI entrypoint (`dgpipe`), and reproducible formatting/linting (`black`, `ruff`) plus `pytest` configuration suitable for CI/CD.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["hatchling>=1.24"]
build-backend = "hatchling.build\""",
"""[project]
name = "dgpipe"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Discrete-gravity microstructure to experiment pipeline: simulation, correlators, entanglement diagnostics, inference."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "dgpipe contributors"}]
keywords = ["causal-sets", "discrete-gravity", "analogue-gravity", "correlators", "entanglement", "bayesian-inference"]
classifiers = [
  "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
  "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
  "Operating System :: OS Independent",
  "Intended Audience :: Science/Research",
  "Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Physics",
]

dependencies = [
  "numpy>=1.24",
  "scipy>=1.10",
  "pandas>=2.0",
  "xarray>=2023.1.0",
  "networkx>=3.1",
  "matplotlib>=3.7",
  "seaborn>=0.13",
  "arviz>=0.16",
  "pymc>=5.10",
  "h5py>=3.9",
  "tqdm>=4.66",
  "click>=8.1",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
  "pytest>=7.4",
  "pytest-cov>=4.1",
  "ruff>=0.5",
  "black>=24.4",
  "mypy>=1.10",
  "types-tqdm",
]

[project.scripts]
dgpipe = "dgpipe.cli:main\""",
"""[tool.hatch.build.targets.wheel]
packages = ["src/dgpipe\"]""",
"""[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ["py310"]
skip-string-normalization = false\""",
"""[tool.ruff]
line-length = 88
target-version = "py310"
extend-exclude = ["build", "dist", ".venv"]
[tool.ruff.lint]
select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP", "SIM"]
ignore = ["E501"]\""",
"""[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "7.0"
addopts = "-q --disable-warnings --maxfail=1 --cov=dgpipe --cov-report=term-missing"
testpaths = ["tests"]
pythonpath = ["src"]"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["hatchling>=1.24"]
build-backend = "hatchling.build\""",
]

from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["hatchling>=1.24"]
build-backend = "hatchling.build"
""",
"""[project]
name = "dgpipe"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Discrete-gravity microstructure to experiment pipeline: simulation, correlators, entanglement diagnostics, inference."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = { text = "MIT" }
authors = [{ name = "dgpipe contributors" }]
keywords = ["causal-sets", "discrete-gravity", "analogue-gravity", "correlators", "entanglement", "bayesian-inference"]
classifiers = [
  "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
  "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
  "Operating System :: OS Independent",
  "Intended Audience :: Science/Research",
  "Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Physics",
]

dependencies = [
  "numpy>=1.24",
  "scipy>=1.10",
  "pandas>=2.0",
  "xarray>=2023.1.0",
  "networkx>=3.1",
  "matplotlib>=3.7",
  "seaborn>=0.13",
  "arviz>=0.16",
  "pymc>=5.10",
  "h5py>=3.9",
  "tqdm>=4.66",
  "click>=8.1",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
  "pytest>=7.4",
  "pytest-cov>=4.1",
  "ruff>=0.5",
  "black>=24.4",
  "mypy>=1.10",
  "types-tqdm",
]

[project.scripts]
dgpipe = "dgpipe.cli:main"
""",
"""[tool.hatch.build.targets.wheel]
packages = ["src/dgpipe"]
""",
"""[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ["py310"]
skip-string-normalization = false
""",
"""[tool.ruff]
line-length = 88
target-version = "py310"
extend-exclude = ["build", "dist", ".venv"]
[tool.ruff.lint]
select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP", "SIM"]
ignore = ["E501"]
""",
"""[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "7.0"
addopts = "-q --disable-warnings --maxfail=1 --cov=dgpipe --cov-report=term-missing"
testpaths = ["tests"]
pythonpath = ["src"]
""",
]

final_text = "\n".join(block.strip("\n") for block in chunks).strip() + "\n"
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding="utf-8")

print("FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml")
print(
    "DIR_STATE:"
    + json.dumps(
        sorted(
            str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data")))
            for p in target_path.parent.glob("*")
            if p.is_file()
        )
    )
)

content.text: Created `pyproject.toml` defining the `dgpipe` package metadata, core/dev dependencies, CLI entrypoint (`dgpipe`), and reproducible formatting/linting (`black`, `ruff`) plus `pytest` configuration suitable for CI/CD.
